sen.j: この寺は、聖徳太子によって開かれたと伝えられるが、一説によれば平安時代中期の真言宗の僧で宇多法皇から灌頂を受けた寛空（882年～970年）が創建したとも伝えられる。
sen.e: Although this temple is reported to have been founded by Prince Shotoku, someone says that it was originally built in the middle of the Heian Period by Kanku (882-970), a monk of Shingon Sect, who had received from Cloistered Emperor Uda a ceremonial Kanjo (the esoteric Buddhist ritual of pouring water on the top of a monk's head.)
